titles.title: A resolution condemning the unauthorized disclosure and publication of classified information about the Terrorist Finance Tracking Program, the National Security Agency's Terrorist Surveillance Program, and other vital counter-terrorism programs.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/29/2006--Introduced. Condemns leaks and the publication of national security information about the Terrorist Finance Tracking Program and the National Security Agency's Terrorist Surveillance Program. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Department of Justice should investigate and prosecute persons responsible for unauthorized disclosures to news organizations about the Terrorist Finance Tracking Program, the National Security Agency's Terrorist Surveillance Program, and other vital counter-terrorist programs.
